text: Gorazd Srbljak (born 24 August 1997) is a Macedonian tennis player. Srbljak has a career high ATP singles ranking of 868 achieved on 26 August 2019. He also has a career high ATP doubles ranking of 1,565 achieved on 25 November 2019. Srbljak hasn't won an ITF title. Srbljak has represented Macedonia at Davis Cup. In Davis Cup he has a win-loss record of 8–8. ==Davis Cup== ===Participations: (8–8)=== {| |-valign=top | {|class=wikitable !Group membership |-bgcolor=#FFFFCC |World Group (0–0) |- style="background:#B0E0E6;" |WG Play-off (0–0) |-bgcolor=#CCFFCC |Group I (0–0) |-bgcolor=#FFCCFF |Group II (0–0) |-bgcolor=#99CCFF |Group III (8–8) |-bgcolor=#FFCC99 |Group IV (0–0) |} | {|class=wikitable !Matches by surface |- |Hard (3–1) |- |Clay (5–7) |- |Grass (0–0) |- |Carpet (0–0) |} | {|class=wikitable |- !Matches by type |- |Singles (5–4) |- |Doubles (3–4) |} |} * indicates the outcome of the Davis Cup match followed by the score, date, place of event, the zonal classification and its phase, and the court surface. {|class=wikitable !Rubber outcome !No. !Rubber !Match type (partner if any) !Opponent nation !Opponent player(s) !Score |- !colspan=7|3–0;
